name: Dev Caps
description:
DEV CAPS

Strategy Card RPG-style game

As an indie games developer you wear many hats - artist, programmer, designer, sound technician, producer etc...

I used this concept to create a game called DEV CAPS.

Story

You are a games developer that encounter issues when starting out in game development. You start with an array of cap-cards - ART, DESIGN, PROGRAMMING. As you start your game development journey you encounter some issues where you need to put your THINKING CAP on. 

Use the the CAP-CARD wisely and solve the common issues in game development: Programmer art, programming bugs etc.

Drag the appropriate card to the "ISSUE" to resolve it. 

(There is an issue with the dragging mechanic, sometimes the card gets stuck and you cannot drag it press ESC to return to main menu)

ART = Programmer Art

PROGRAMMING = Bugs

DESIGN = Big ideas
